name: Miku 24/7
description:
Hello!

First of all I would like to say I am sorry! OTL

I made it during NaNoReNo 2021! It's a bit short and very simple, I made it mainly with my cringe, sweat and tears and with the help of a few friends! I hope to improve and do even better in the future, but for now I am very happy I manages to finish it!

Sorry if there is still typos left!! ; _ ; Trying my best to learn English but I still suck at it!

Sadly I didn't have anyone to test the mac version, so hopefully it works!
